remarks: If there is a cofinal map from ` A ` to ` B ` , then they have the same cofinality.  This was used as Definition 11.1 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 100, who defines an equivalence relation cof ` ( A , B ) ` and defines our ` cf ( B ) ` as the minimum ` B ` such that cof ` ( A , B ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2013.)
statement:
cfcof $p |- ( ( A e. On /\ B e. On ) -> ( E. f ( f : B --> A /\ Smo f /\ A. z e. A E. w e. B z C_ ( f ` w ) ) -> ( cf ` A ) = ( cf ` B ) ) ) $.
$d A f w z $.
$d B f w z $.
